verbs.description: Those close to Sen. John McCain ( R - Ariz . ) [V: have] told the White House that their plan for the Arizona Republican 's eventual funeral is to have Vice President Pence attend - but not President Trump , The New York Times reports . The funeral is expected to take place at the Washington National Cathedral , according to the Times . But Trump , with whom McCa ...
